sources.title: Sing, Sinner, Sing
sources.description: Glamorous torch singer Lela Larson (Leila Hyams) runs away to marry the moneyed Ted Rendon (Don Dillaway), but when he's murdered, she becomes the prime suspect destined for the electric chair. Her possible motive? She wanted to escape the world of seedy nightclubs and dangerous mobsters - including her former gang boss lover, Phil Carida (Paul Lukas) - but Rendon turned out to be a womanizing scoundrel.

sources.title: Sing, Sinner, Sing (1933) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
Stars: Paul Lukas, Leila Hyams, Don Dillaway
Director: Howard Christie

A singer on a gambling ship is married to a wealthy playboy. When he is found murdered, all evidence points to her as the culprit, and she is put on trial!

metadata.Plot: A singer on a gambling ship is married to a wealthy playboy. When he is found murdered, all evidence points to her as the culprit, and she is put on trial for the crime.
metadata.Writer: Wilson Collison, Edward T. Lowe Jr.
metadata.Actors: Paul Lukas, Leila Hyams, Don Dillaway
